name: Smashing Pumpkins (JemWritesCode)
description:
Fullscreen button is available in the bottom right. Unity for web is a bit slow, it may take up to 30 seconds for the game to load. 

This is a simple Halloween version of Wack-a-mole. Just click the pumpkins to destroy them and don't miss!

This is our game for the One Minute Game Jam! The goal is to make a game with play lasts approximately 1 minute. And the theme for this jam was pumpkins! Since we made it in just a few days you can expect to find bugs and other issues, but we'd still be happy to hear about them so we can learn! 

Github: https://github.com/JemWritesCode/OneMinuteGameJam

Thanks for playing!

Team:

JemWritesCode & Redseiko
